question: who starred in the pirates of the caribbean
api_result:
The "Pirates of the Caribbean" film series features several prominent actors, with Johnny Depp being the most notable for his role as Captain Jack Sparrow. Other key cast members include:

- Orlando Bloom as Will Turner
- Keira Knightley as Elizabeth Swann
- Geoffrey Rush as Captain Hector Barbossa
- Bill Nighy as Davy Jones
- Penélope Cruz as Angelica (in "On Stranger Tides")
- Javier Bardem as Captain Salazar (in "Dead Men Tell No Tales")

These actors contributed to the series' popularity and success across its multiple installments.
